subject: Tracking number SF6045967023267
description_text:
Good evening,

I placed an order on the 15th of October 2025. Please refer to the tracking
number above.

It shows my package has been out for delivery since October 23rd, 2025. Was
there any issues regarding delivery? What is the delivery time frame?

Please advise.

Thank you,

Damien Jassor

conversations.body_text: Hi Damien Jassor,    We have inquired with the logistics provider and will provide you with an update tomorrow. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
